product_name: prAna Rena Reversible Bikini Bottoms - Women's
long_description: The prAna Rena Reversible bikini bottoms are ready for any scene; classic solid colors suit a poolside afternoon while a loud print is totally ready to party. Classic bikini leg cut and low rise create a modern silhouette, removable side ties provide stylish detail. Includes prAna Rena Reversible bikini bottoms only.
